issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
h3. Description
Need the ability to share a post with images on twitter but currently only string message can be posted using the same.
Note: Twitter api does support this functionality on 1.1 API.
https://dev.twitter.com/docs/api/1.1/post/statuses/update_with_media
fields.summary: Alloy builtins to share a post on twitter with images but currently only string message is supported
